summary: Do add adgroup for one campaign
description: Do add adgroup for one campaign.

query.name: campaignId
query.description: Campaign id which you want to add into.

query.name: bizCode
query.description: Decided to choose which advertisement solution.SD:sponsoredSearch.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/sponsor/solutions/adgroup/addAdgroupBatch')
request.add_api_parameter("campaignId", "101100023522312")
request.add_api_parameter("bizCode", "sponsoredSearch")
request.add_api_parameter("adgroupViewDTOList", "[{\"autoKeyword\":\"2\",\"audienceViewDTOList\":[{\"adCrowdTag\":\"1\",\"discount\":\"40\"},{\"adCrowdTag\":\"1\",\"discount\":\"40\"}],\"itemId\":\"3598680999\",\"bidwordViewDTOList\":[{\"keyword\":\"starbuck\",\"bidPrice\":\"40\"},{\"keyword\":\"starbuck\",\"bidPrice\":\"40\"}],\"adgroupName\":\"testcomlazPicks\",\"autoItemSelect\":\"1\",\"autoCreative\":\"1\",\"bidPrice\":\"2.57\"}]")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/sponsor/solutions/adgroup/addAdgroupBatch')
request.add_api_param('campaignId', '101100023522312')
request.add_api_param('bizCode', 'sponsoredSearch')
request.add_api_param('adgroupViewDTOList', '[{\"autoKeyword\":\"2\",\"audienceViewDTOList\":[{\"adCrowdTag\":\"1\",\"discount\":\"40\"},{\"adCrowdTag\":\"1\",\"discount\":\"40\"}],\"itemId\":\"3598680999\",\"bidwordViewDTOList\":[{\"keyword\":\"starbuck\",\"bidPrice\":\"40\"},{\"keyword\":\"starbuck\",\"bidPrice\":\"40\"}],\"adgroupName\":\"testcomlazPicks\",\"autoItemSelect\":\"1\",\"autoCreative\":\"1\",\"bidPrice\":\"2.57\"}]')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
